Uses of Package
se3projecta.GUI

Packages that use se3projecta.GUI
se3projecta.GUI This package contains classes used in the Graphical User Interface of this application. 
 

Classes in se3projecta.GUI used by se3projecta.GUI
Allocation
          Links a together a particular SeatType, CustomerType and numberOfTickets, resulting in a particular cost.
AllocationListener
          A listener that listens for changes in an Allocation and makes required changes.
GUI
          Main GUI Frame which allows the entire booking process to take place.
GUI.GUIState
          The states the GUI can be in.
JAllocationPanel
          JPanel which holds allocation widgets.
JTransactionPanel
          JPanel which holds one or more JAllocationPanels, and allows their addition and removal, and also holds a JAllocationPanelNavigation.
Transaction
          Stores information about the current transaction; particularly what allocations of seats there are, which TheatreSession the transaction is for.
TransactionListener
          A set of listeners listener that are executed when change are made to the subscribed Transaction object.
